#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

= UIMA@GSCL 2013 Tutorial (UKP) =

== System requirements ==
   * Eclipse (recent version, 4.3 Standard recommended)
   * m2e plugin installed in Eclipse (available via Help -> Install new software)
   * UIMA Eclipse Plugins available here
   * Internet connection

== Slides ==

   * [https://dkpro-tutorials.googlecode.com/svn/de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.tutorial/GSCL2013/tags/latest/slides/GSCL2013UIMATutorialUKP.pdf Slides]

== Code ==

   * Check out the code from Subversion 
{{{
svn co https://dkpro-tutorials.googlecode.com/svn/de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.tutorial/GSCL2013/tags/latest GSCL2013
}}}
   * In Eclipse select *File -> Import -> General -> Existing Maven projects*
   * Point the dialog to the folder you extracted the archive to, make sure all projects are selected and press the *Finish* button
   * The system will now fetch all necessary libraries and resources from the internet. After the process is complete and Eclipse is at rest, you can check out the examples.



If you have questions or problems with the examples, [https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/dkpro-core-user post a question to our discussion group] or [mailto:dkpro-core-user@googlegroups.com mail us] - we will try to provide some assistance.


This is the material from the UIMA tutorial held in conjunction with the 3rd UIMA@GCSL workshop.
Slides 1 - Apache UIMA™, Apache uimaFIT™, and DKPro Core component collection
Slides 2 - Apache UIMA Ruta™  
Examples - Examples from the workshop
